subtitle: A delicious warm starter that also makes an ideal party nibble if made with button mushrooms.

ingredients.ingredient: soft cheese with garlic and herbs

method.text: Wipe the mushrom caps well. Place in a lightly greased ovenproof dish with the dark side uppermost.
Put the filling ingredients into a food processor or blender. Blend. Spoon on top of the mushrooms, keeping away from the extreme edges.
Place in the oven for 10-12 min. Serve warm.

title: Cheese-stuffed mushrooms
